original_title: Trump spotted chatting with Macron about potential Putin peace deal  | Fox News
article_summary: Trump believes Putin wants to make a peace deal with Ukraine, a sentiment shared by French President Emmanuel Macron, who sees this as a potential breakthrough in the ongoing conflict. Trump's efforts to broker a meeting between Putin and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy have been praised by European leaders for making more progress than under previous leadership.</s>
